mapper.update:
update eph_infcenter_information
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_sources = #{infoSources,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
encode_file_name = #{encodeFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
velocity_name = #{velocityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
clicks = #{clicks,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_effective = #{isEffective,jdbcType=CHAR},
text = #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
website_id = #{websiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
first_level_id = #{firstLevelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
second_level_id = #{secondLevelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_top = #{isTop,jdbcType=CHAR},
isIndex=#{isIndex,jdbcType=CHAR},
indexUrl=#{indexUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
describition=#{describition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT e.isIndex, e.indexUrl, e.id, e.title, e.info_sources, e.file_name, e.clicks, e.operator, e.operate_time, e.is_effective, e.text, e.velocity_name, e.website_id, e.first_level_id, e.second_level_id, e.is_top, eip1.column_zh_name first_name, eip2.column_zh_name seconde_name, eip3.column_zh_name thread_name, eip4.column_zh_name fourth_name, eip5.column_zh_name fifty_name, e.indexUrl indexUrl FROM eph_infcenter_information e LEFT JOIN eph_infcenter_pilot eip1 ON eip1.id = e.website_id LEFT JOIN eph_infcenter_pilot eip2 ON eip2.id = e.first_level_id LEFT JOIN eph_infcenter_pilot eip3 ON eip3.id = e.second_level_id LEFT JOIN eph_public_employee eie ON eie.employee_id = e.operator LEFT JOIN eph_infcenter_pilot eip4 ON eip4.id = e.third_level_id LEFT JOIN eph_infcenter_pilot eip5 ON eip5.id = e.fourth_level_id WHERE e.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT eii.id, eii.title, eii.info_sources, eii.text, eii.clicks, eie.`name` operator, eii.operate_time, eii.is_effective, eii.is_top, eip1.column_zh_name first_name, eip2.column_zh_name seconde_name FROM eph_infcenter_information eii LEFT JOIN eph_infcenter_pilot eip1 ON eip1.id = eii.website_id LEFT JOIN eph_infcenter_pilot eip2 ON eip2.id = eii.first_level_id LEFT JOIN eph_public_employee eie ON eie.employee_id = eii.operator where 1=1
order by eii.operate_time desc limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(eii.id) FROM eph_infcenter_information eii INNER JOIN eph_infcenter_pilot eip1 ON eip1.id = eii.website_id INNER JOIN eph_infcenter_pilot eip2 ON eip2.id = eii.first_level_id INNER JOIN eph_public_employee eie ON eie.employee_id = eii.operator where 1=1

select eip1.page_save_path webPath, eip2.page_save_path firstPath, eip3.page_save_path secondPath, eip4.page_save_path thirdPath, eip5.page_save_path fourthPath, eii.file_name fileName, eip3.velocity_name velocityName, eip1.column_url columnUrl from eph_infcenter_information eii left JOIN eph_infcenter_pilot eip1 on eii.website_id = eip1.id left JOIN eph_infcenter_pilot eip2 on eii.first_level_id = eip2.id left JOIN eph_infcenter_pilot eip3 on eii.second_level_id = eip3.id left JOIN eph_infcenter_pilot eip4 on eii.third_level_id = eip4.id left JOIN eph_infcenter_pilot eip5 on eii.fourth_level_id = eip5.id where eii.id = #{id}

SELECT i.id, i.title, DATE_FORMAT(i.operate_time,'%Y-%m-%d') operate_time FROM eph_infcenter_information i where is_effective='1' and first_level_id = #first_level_id# order by i.operate_time desc limit #{top_num}
